alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued February 15 at 8:55AM PST until February 16 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Beaches, San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast, Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches and Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast. * WHEN...From late tonight through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast
